Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: Appleton Road runs diagonally between the Cattle Ranch and Slaughterhouse.
Room.LongDescription: The Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch furnishes Oceancrest with much of the fresh, domesticated meat to its citizens. The cattle are born and raised on the Ranch and then herded to the Slaughterhouse, located on the west side of the road. The Circle-Bar Ranch gladly accepts help from any outsiders that might want to help slaughtering the cows as most people pass out from all the blood and stench.
